title: Typology of Distance Education Teachers’ Perceptions and Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Short intensive course for science sector managers/leaders, with provided digital devices and conducted via online LMS. Operates with a formative assessment focus

learning_goals: They can explain five core dimensions of remote education issues (learning effectiveness, personalization, administrative tasks, etc.).
They can specify characteristics of teacher perception types (skeptics, optimists, cautiously optimistic, exceptional cases).
They can propose customized remote education strategies for teacher types based on factor and cluster analysis results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
